meanings.definition: A person in charge; a boss or leader.
meanings.sent1: The jefe of the team made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The jefe at the office is always busy with meetings.
meanings.sent3: The jefe tried to do a cartwheel but failed hilariously.
meanings.sent4: She was the jefe of the kitchen, orchestrating the cooking like a maestro.
meanings.sent5: The jefe's presence in the room commanded respect from everyone.

meanings.definition: The head or chief of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Our jefe oversees all the projects in the company.
meanings.sent2: The jefe of the club welcomed new members warmly.
meanings.sent3: The jefe accidentally wore mismatched socks to the important meeting.
meanings.sent4: As the jefe of the band, he set the tempo for the music.
meanings.sent5: The jefe's office was always filled with hardworking employees.
